00079 double Add :: getValueAtSample(aw::SampleTimeType st)
00080 {
00081     sr_ = sys_->getSamplingRate();
00082 
00083     value1_ = pMap_[aw::pNameOperand1]->getValueAtSample(st);
00084     value2_ = pMap_[aw::pNameOperand2]->getValueAtSample(st);
00085     value3_ = pMap_[aw::pNameOperand3]->getValueAtSample(st);
00086     value4_ = pMap_[aw::pNameOperand4]->getValueAtSample(st);
00087 
00088     return value1_ + value2_ + value3_ + value4_;
